description: John Bermingham, 86, and Mary Long, 83, decide not to let Covid-19 delay their wedding any longer.
title: Irish couple in their 80s finally say 'I do' 40 years after meeting
title_page: Irish couple in their 80s finally say 'I do' 40 years after meeting - BBC News
maintext: "I know they're very old and, as they say themselves, they were afraid that one of them would pass away before they got a chance to do it and so I decided to take the matter in hand and try to help them and sort them out."
